description:
Every now and then I like to toss two guys together so I can just 'coast' and sit back and film.
Both Kristopher and Micah are polished performers by now, and both really get into the scene.
I am pretty sure this is Kristopher's last shoot for a while as he leaves for training and likely overseas. Nothing is certain of course, but I wanted his possibly last shoot be a fun and easy one.
True to their nature, the two of them click and it is so enjoyable watching two guys try to 'out please' the other guy.
This is a rock-solid G:hole video, with full on sex and just little urinal peeing to for piss fans.
Seriously, you don't want to miss this super-charged video. These two go to town on each other!
title: Kristopher & Micah - G:hOle RAW
